bibl.title: Pharaoh's Reeds. A Papyrus Journey up the Nile; - Les Flors del Faraó. Un viatge pel Nil a través dels seus papirs; - Las Flores del Faraón. Un viaje por el Nilo a través de sus papiros.
bibl.note: Catalogue of the exhibition "Pharaoh's Reeds. A Papyrus Journey up the Nile" held in the General Archive of the Crown of Aragon in Barcelona between 20th April and 25th September 2016 on the occasion of the 28th International Congress of Papyrology. - Pp. 9-11: Forewords (by Carles Puigdemont i Casamajó, Senén Florensa & Carlos López Rodríguez); - 13-15, 1 fig. coul.: [Introduction] (by S.T.T. & A.N.D.).; - 83-125, nombr. figg. coul.: Catalogue (Nos 1-78, by María Jesús Albarrán Martínez, Angela Camara, S.C.M., Marina Escolano Poveda, A. de Fr.G., Lluís González Juliá, Felipe G. Hernández Muñoz, W. Matt Malczycki, R.M.H., Richard Neer, A.N.D., Irene Pajón Leyra, José Domingo Rodríguez Martín, Marco Antonio Santamaría Álvarez, Petra M. Sijpesteijn, María Victoria Spottorno, S.T.T., Luis Turell Coll, Alexandra Uscatescu & Amalia Zomeño Rodríguez). - Cf. pp. 129-131; 133-135; 191-221 [Catalan version]; - 225-227; 229-231; 289-320 [Spanish version].
bibl.seg: Sofía Torallas Tovar, Alberto Nodar Domínguez, Raquel Martín Hernández & Alba de Frutos García (edd.), with the assistance of Sergio Carro Martín, Pharaoh's Reeds. A Papyrus Journey up the Nile; - Les Flors del Faraó. Un viatge pel Nil a través dels seus papirs; - Las Flores del Faraón. Un viaje por el Nilo a través de sus papiros. Translations by Hèctor Cesena, Pere Bramon & Neil Charlton.
Barcelona, European Institute of the Mediterranean (IEMed), 2016, 4°, 328 pp., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-84-393-9420-4. €35.

Catalogue of the exhibition "Pharaoh's Reeds. A Papyrus Journey up the Nile" held in the General Archive of the Crown of Aragon in Barcelona between 20th April and 25th September 2016 on the occasion of the 28th International Congress of Papyrology. - Pp. 9-11: Forewords (by Carles Puigdemont i Casamajó, Senén Florensa & Carlos López Rodríguez); - 13-15, 1 fig. coul.: [Introduction] (by S.T.T. & A.N.D.).; - 83-125, nombr. figg. coul.: Catalogue (Nos 1-78, by María Jesús Albarrán Martínez, Angela Camara, S.C.M., Marina Escolano Poveda, A. de Fr.G., Lluís González Juliá, Felipe G. Hernández Muñoz, W. Matt Malczycki, R.M.H., Richard Neer, A.N.D., Irene Pajón Leyra, José Domingo Rodríguez Martín, Marco Antonio Santamaría Álvarez, Petra M. Sijpesteijn, María Victoria Spottorno, S.T.T., Luis Turell Coll, Alexandra Uscatescu & Amalia Zomeño Rodríguez). - Cf. pp. 129-131; 133-135; 191-221 [Catalan version]; - 225-227; 229-231; 289-320 [Spanish version].
Torallas Tovar Nodar Domínguez Martín Hernández de Frutos García Carro Martín Cesena Bramon Charlton
